Detailed Description

Class for making digest, hashes, using a specified digest method.

MC2Digest::MC2Digest (  const MC2String &  digestName  ) 
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
digestName The name of the digest to use, like "DSS1" or "dss1" or "DSA-SHA1" or "dsaWithSHA1". Another example: "MD5" or "md5".
